column5: English
column11: English

column5: Let's go to the Bullet Workshop.
column11: Let's go to the Bullet Workshop.

column4:
八工房の中でも、
特に強い人形を作るらしいぜ。
column5: The Puppets they produce are supposed to be super strong, even for one of the Eight Workshops.
column11: Even among the Hachi Workshops, the mechs they produce are supposed to be particularly strong.

column5: Let's go right now!
column11: We're heading out now.

column5: Wha--!?
column11: Wha-!?

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

column5: The Bullet Workshop, huh...?
column11: The Bullet Workshop, eh...?

column4:
あの工房は“銃を持つ人形”を
作ることで知られている。
column5: That workshop is known for making Puppets armed with guns.
column11: That workshop is known for making 'mechs armed with guns'.

column4:
確かに、戦闘能力だけなら、
八工房の中でも一番かもしれん。
column5: In terms of combat ability alone, they certainly might be the best of the Eight.
column11: Certainly, in combat ability alone, they might well be the best out of the Hachi Workshops.

column5: So I was right!
column11: So I was right!

column4: じゃあ、行くしかないぜ！
column5: Well, let's get a move on!
column11: Well, let's get a move on!

column5: We're headed to /c5Lugol/c3!
column11: We're headed to /c5Lugol/c3!

column4: 開拓者の街ルゴールだ。
column5: Lugol, the city of pioneers.
column11: Lugol, the city of pioneers.

column5: Come on, get ready!
column11: Come on, get ready.

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

column5: Well, I suppose it's fine.
column11: Well, I suppose it's fine.

column5: It's a long way away, though.
column11: Although, it is far.

column4:
ルゴールは、辺境の荒地を
切り開いて作られた街だ。
ここからだと、かなりの距離だ。
column5: Lugol was built by making a clearing in a remote wasteland. It's pretty far from here.
column11: Lugol was built by creating a clearing in a remote wasteland. From here, it's quite a way away.

column5: Whatever! We're still going!
column11: Even so, we're still going!

column4:
冗談じゃないよ！！
私は行かないからね！
column5:
You must be joking!
I'm NOT coming with you!
column11:
You must be joking!!
I'm not coming with!

column5: Huh?
column11: Huh?

column5: Why not?
column11: Why?

column4:
行かないったら、
行かないよ。
column5: I said I didn't want to go, so I'm not going.
column11: Because I said I didn't want to go, so I'm not going.

column5: But...
column11: But...

column4:
あんな恐ろしい場所、
絶対に行くもんか。
column5: There's no way I'm going to such an awful place.
column11: There's no way I'm going to go to such an awful place.

column5: Have you been there before?
column11: Have you been there before?

column4:
ないよ。
近づく気もない。
column5:
No way.
I wouldn't dare go near.
column11:
No way.
I wouldn't dare go near.

column4:
行ったこともないのに、
なんでそんなに嫌がるのさ？
column5: How can you hate it so much even though you've never been?
column11: How can you hate it so much even though you've never been?

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣
お前、噂を信じてるのか？
column5: You...Don't tell me you believe all the rumors?
column11: You, don't tell me you believe in all the rumours?

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中苦しい

column5: I'm flabbergasted.
column11: I'm gobsmacked.

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

column5: Let me explain.
column11: Let me explain.

column4:
ルゴールは２００年前、
荒野へと移住した荒くれ者たち
によって建設された街だ。
column5: Lugol was built over 200 years ago by a bunch of ruffians who immigrated to the wastelands.
column11: Lugol was built over 200 years ago, by a bunch of ruffians who emigrated to the wastelands.

column4:
ゆえに開拓者の街と
呼ばれている。
column5: Hence, the {city of pioneers}.
column11: Hence it's called the city of pioneers.

column4:
歴史の浅い街だが……
そのせいか、妙な噂があってな。
column5:
It's a city without a lot of history...
That's why a lot of weird rumors fly around.
column11:
It's a city without a lot of history...
That's why there are strange rumours flying around.

column4:
ルゴールに住む人は
世界一好戦的で、全員が
銃を携帯している。
column5: {The people of Lugol are incredibly aggressive, and everyone carries a gun around.}
column11: The people of Lugol are incredibly aggressive, and everyone carries a gun around.

column4:
よそ者が、ちょっとでも不審な
行動をとると、すぐに撃たれる。
そんな噂だ。
column5:
{If they see a stranger doing some-
thing even slightly suspicious, they shoot on sight.} Rumors like that.
column11: If they see stranger doing something even slightly suspicious, they'll shoot on sight. Those kind of rumours.

column4: もちろん、そんなわけはない。
column5: That's not the case, of course.
column11: Of course, that's not the case.

column4:
ルゴールが
荒野の無法地帯だったのは
昔の話。
column5: The stories about Lugol being a lawless wasteland are just old tales.
column11: The stories about Lugol being a lawless wasteland are just old tales.

column4:
今や世界でも有数の
大都市となっている。
column5: It's now one of the greatest metropolises in the world.
column11: It's now one of the foremost metropolises in the world.

column4:
大陸で最も近代的な文明を
持つ街といってもいい。
column5: They say it's home to the most modern civilization on the continent.
column11: It's said to be home to the most modern civilisation on the continent.

column5: Wow.
column11: Wow.

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

だから心配ない。
いきなり撃たれやしない。
column5:
So don't worry.
You won't get shot out of nowhere.
column11:
So don't worry.
You won't be shot at without warning.

column4: そんなことわからないだろ。
column5: That's not what I heard.
column11: That's not what I heard.

column4:
ルゴールの人は銃が大好き。
寝る時も枕の下に
銃を置いておく。
column5: The people of Lugol are crazy about guns. They sleep with them tucked under their pillows at night.
column11: The people of Lugol are crazy about guns. They sleep with one tucked under their pillow at night.

column4:
そんな危ないところに
近づくのはゴメンだよ。
column5: If you go to a dangerous place like that, you'll be sorry.
column11: If you go near such a dangerous place, you'll be sorry.

column4: ガロイ親方＿まいったな

でも、人形王に勝てるマリオネ
ーションギアを手に入れるのが、
俺たちの目的だろ？
column5: But aren't we trying to get a Marionation Gear that can beat the Puppet King?
column11: But, isn't our goal to get a Marionation Gear that could beat the Mech King?

column4:
誰が何と言おうと、
絶対に行かないからね。
column5: I don't care WHAT anyone says! There's no way I'm going there.
column11: No matter what anyone says, there's no way I'm going to go there.
